description: Retrieves the list of metrics and dimensions that a RUM app monitor is sending to a single destination.

parameters.name: AppMonitorName
parameters.description: The name of the CloudWatch RUM app monitor that is sending the metrics.

parameters.name: Destination
parameters.description: The type of destination that you want to view metrics for. Valid values are CloudWatch and Evidently.

parameters.name: DestinationArn
parameters.description: This parameter is required if Destination is Evidently. If Destination is CloudWatch, do not use this parameter. This parameter specifies the ARN of the Evidently experiment that corresponds to the destination.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return in one operation. The default is 50. The maximum that you can specify is 100. To retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned NextToken value.

nested_items.name: MetricDefinitions
nested_items.description: An array of structures that display information about the metrics that are sent by the specified app monitor to the specified destination.

nested_items.name: DimensionKeys
nested_items.description: This field is a map of field paths to dimension names. It defines the dimensions to associate with this metric in CloudWatch The value of this field is used only if the metric destination is CloudWatch. If the metric destination is Evidently, the value of DimensionKeys is ignored.

nested_items.name: EventPattern
nested_items.description: The pattern that defines the metric. RUM checks events that happen in a user's session against the pattern, and events that match the pattern are sent to the metric destination.

nested_items.name: MetricDefinitionId
nested_items.description: The ID of this metric definition.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the metric that is defined in this structure.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: If this metric definition is for a custom metric instead of an extended metric, this field displays the metric namespace that the custom metric is published to.

nested_items.name: UnitLabel
nested_items.description: Use this field only if you are sending this metric to CloudWatch. It defines the CloudWatch metric unit that this metric is measured in.

nested_items.name: ValueKey
nested_items.description: The field within the event object that the metric value is sourced from.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token that you can use in a subsequent operation to retrieve the next set of results.
